channel.title: Encryption Help
channel.description:
Hello there.
How can the ISAAC Cipher be used to encrypt data? (such as opcodes)
I believe I understand the basic idea, as in during the login block the server sends the client the server session key (generated with ISAAC) that will be used to decrypt/encrypt the opcodes, but how is this put into practice? Is the key simply added to the data that needs encryption?
Thank you.

item.title: Encryption Help
